meanings.sent1: She enjoys trendifying her outfits with colorful accessories.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer is trendifying the latest collection with unique patterns.
meanings.sent3: The cat trendified the room by knocking over all the pillows.
meanings.sent4: Her smile trendified the gloomy atmosphere like a burst of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The new hairstyle trendified her look, making her stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: The act of following or setting a trend.
meanings.sent1: Her trendifying of the latest fashion trends is impressive.
meanings.sent2: Trendifying can be exciting when you are ahead of the curve.
meanings.sent3: The trendifying of social media challenges keeps everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: His trendifying of the music scene brought a fresh vibe to the industry.
meanings.sent5: The trendifying of technology is constantly changing how we live our lives.
